msbt.message: Whoa! Way to never stop looking for that treasure! Great hustle. Except time's up, so I gotta take that.
I'm in total awe of your focus. I bet nothing can stop you. The rematch is gonna be so awesome, !

Oh, thank fitness. You're alright!I was just waiting to see how the treasure hunt was going, then it got dark, and I kinda freaked out.Let's clear the leaderboard for this and try again another time, OK? I wanna give you a fair shot.
